aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.description1: Hi! I'm Carlos Keglevich, a Backend Developer based in Germany.
aboutSection.description2: I specialize in Java Spring Boot and PostgreSQL, focusing on scalable and secure REST APIs.
aboutSection.description3: When not coding, I enjoy coffee, tech, and exploring new frameworks.

experience1.title: Backend Developer | Personal Project
experience1.summary: Developed a backend service for stock management using Java Spring Boot.

experience2.title: Full Stack Developer Course - Dio (online)
experience2.summary: Developed projects including a portfolio website, BuzzFeed app, and restaurant finder app.

experience3.title: Duagon GmbH, Electronics Factory | Machine Operator
experience3.summary: Operated machines and analyzed software for PCB soldering processes.

experience4.title: K&K Brands, Atlanta USA | Buyer
experience4.summary: Optimized purchasing decisions and developed pricing models.

experience5.title: Alcon-Novartis | Production Worker
experience5.summary: Improved production output by 45% through process optimization.

Liability for content

The contents of this website were created with the greatest care. However, no guarantee can be given for the accuracy, completeness and topicality of the contents.

Liability for links

This website contains links to external third-party websites, over which I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot accept any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

Copyright

The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law.

Privacy Policy

This website respects your privacy. No personal data is actively collected, stored, or shared without your consent.

The website does not use cookies, analytics, or tracking services. Server logs may be collected by the hosting provider for security and performance and are deleted automatically within a reasonable period.

If you contact me by e-mail, the information you provide (such as your name, email address, and message) will be processed solely to respond to your inquiry.
